p: Three fungi ( Aspergillus flavus, Fusarium oxysporum and Candida albicans) were used in antifungal activity tests by disk diffusion method, the antifungal activity was recorded as clear zones of inhibition surrounding the disc (mm). Compound 362 showed antifungal activity against F. oxysporum (zone of inhibition was 6 mm) and variable activities against A. flavus and the yeast C. albicans (zone of inhibition was 5 mm). Nystatin (10 mg/disc) was used as standard antifungal (zone of inhibition against A. flavus and F. oxysporum were 12 mm and 17 mm) [ 116].
